boardgame.name: Tanto Cuore
たんとくおーれ
boardgame.description: Tanto Cuore is a Japanese deck-building card game which has a mechanism similar to Dominion._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player plays as the Lord of a mansion and hires maids to fill out their house to become the King of Maids! The end goal is simple enough, the player who has the most Victory Points at the end of the game wins! Players acquire Victory Points by employing a variety of maids and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Love_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; cards that allow for different strategies. You can even employ Private Maids that stick around to use their special powers each per turn! Some give you a bonus, or affect your opponents in a negative way. But beware, your opponents can make your maids sick or give them bad habits, affecting your maids in negative ways and decreasing your Victory Points!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game art is in the Japanese anime style and uses the theme of maids commonly seen in anime! All of the cards, dividers and manual fit into an easy to transport box so you can easily take the game with you wherever you want._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: New Sealed copy direct from Japan. Also have 300 FFG Sleeves that I will fit these cards perfectly for an additional $15. If paying by PayPal via Credit/Debit, please add $1.74 (2.9%). Avoid this by paying either directly from your PayPal balance or instant bank transfer. S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;H is $10, but I will refund the difference of the actual cost. And if it cost more, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll just take the hit myself =).

Japanime Games (JPG 001) Each player plays as the Lord of a mansion and hires maids to fill out their house to become the King of Maids! The end goal is simple enough, the player who has the most Victory Points at the end of the game wins! Player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s acquire Victory Points by employing a variety of maids and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Love_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; cards that allow for different strategies. You can even employ Private Maids that stick around to use their special powers each per turn! Some give you a bonus, or affect your opponents in a negative way. But beware, your opponents can make your maids sick or give them bad habits, affecting your maids in negative ways and decreasing your Victory Points! The game art is in the Japanese anime style and uses the theme of maids commonly seen in anime! All of the cards, dividers and manual fit into an easy to transport box so you can easily take the game with you wherever you want.

Note: Arclight Games edition Brand new in original shrinkwrap. I will only charge the actual USPS shipping price (lowest possible) with delivery confirmation for the game. Feel free to browse through my other games for sale in the marketplace. I will provide free shipping in the continental US for orders over $150. I will also offer $10 off on shipping to anywhere else in the world for orders over $150.
New In shrink Wrap All profit to UK Charity Green Corridor RRP: £39.99 Green Corridor Price: £33.00
Buyer pays shipping

Japanime Games (JPG 001) Tanto Cuore is a deck building card game for 2 - 4 players.
The players take the roles of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;masters of the house_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, employ a lot of cute maids, and are served by them while slowly filling out their house (card deck).
But take care. The maids can become sick, or get bad habits!
When the game ends, the player who has the best collection of maids and therefore the most victory points is the perfect master and winner of the game!
All cards and the rulebook are in English. - Note: Tanto Cuore means _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Much heart_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; in Italian.

Japanime Games (JPG 001) A deck-building card game fresh from Japan! Each player plays as the Lord of a mansion and hires maids to fill out their house to become the King of Maids! The end goal is simple enough, the player who has the most Victory Points at the end of the game wins! Player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s acquire Victory Points by employing a variety of maids and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Love_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; cards that allow for different strategies. You can even employ Private Maids that stick around to use their special powers each per turn! Some give you a bonus, or affect your opponents in a negative way. But beware, your opponents can make your maids sick or give them bad habits, affecting your maids in negative ways and decreasing your Victory Points! The game art is in the Japanese anime style and uses the theme of maids commonly seen in anime! All of the cards, dividers and manual fit into an easy to transport box so you can easily take the game with you wherever you want.
Brand New! A portion of the earnings from each sale are donated to St. Jude Children_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Research Hospital. Standard shipping to a continental US street address: $9.00

Pristine condition, played only once or twice. Original insert. Includes _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Promo Card Set #1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; (unopened)! I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m an avid game collector in a smoke-free home and take good care of my games. Unless otherwise noted above, game is complete with little or no shelf wear or damaged components. High-resolution picture available upon request. Domestic US shipping is $11.35 for USPS Priority Mail with tracking (insurance is optional if you want to pay for it). International shipping will be actual price plus USD$5.00 (sorry, it is a much bigger hassle on my end, plus I need to provide the box). Contact me if you have any questions about shipping. Must pay me via PayPal (I will cover the fees). I have many other games up for sale and in most cases I can combine shipping for some significant savings, but please check with me and provide your zip code for details.
Reserved for william4192

Japanime Games (JPG001) Tanto Cuore is a deck building card game for 2 - 4 players. The players take the roles of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;masters of the house_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, employ a lot of cute maids, and are served by them while slowly filling out their house (card deck). But take care. The maids can become sick, or get bad habits! When the game ends, the player who has the best collection of maids and therefore the most victory points is the perfect master and winner of the game!

Japanime Games (JPG001) Tanto Cuore is a deck building card game for 2 - 4 players. The players take the roles of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;masters of the house_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, employ a lot of cute maids, and are served by them while slowly filling out their house (card deck). But take care. The maids can become sick, or get bad habits! When the game ends, the player who has the best collection of maids and therefore the most victory points is the perfect master and winner of the game!

Big Box edition includes base game, Romantic vacation, Expanding the House, Oktoberfest and all bar one promo: Full art versions PR1 - Marianne Soleil PR2 - Colette Framboise PR3 - Sora Nakachi PR4 - Eugenie Fontaine PR5 - Tanya Petrushka PR6 - Claudine de La Rochelle PR7 - Aline Du Roy PR8 - Clymeme Silvestri PR9 - Shion Tsuwabuki PR10 - Eve Valentine PR11 - Silk Amanohara PR12 - Sophia Marfil PR13 - Beatrice Escudo PR16 - Milly Violet (alternate art) PR17 - Mika Yakushido (alternate art) PR20 - Anja Brunner PR21 - Matilde Wiese PR22 - Toni Darling PR23 - Nadja Kersten PR24 - Gina Kersten Cosplay cards - all Oktoberfest PR26 - Party Girls - new Private Maid (no non-cosplay version) PR22P2 - Toni Darling PR23P1 - Nadja Kirsten PR24P2 - Gina Kersten PR10P1 - Julia Kunstler PR12P1 - Anna Hartmann PR14P1 - Aileen Hammerschmidt New cards - all new cards are Private Maids PR14 - Liliana Giornata (requires Romantic Vacation) PR15 - Mimoza PR18 - Ariette Cuore (MISSING extremely rare in English) PR19 - Astrid Wende (requires Oktoberfest) PR25 - Serena Lavaux UK shipping £7.49 - I can ship to mainland Europe but it will be expensive! This is one big, heavy box!
